intent.user_query: What is the monthly sales trend (total sales amount per month) over the last year?

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SaleDate) AS SaleYear, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate) AS SaleMonth, SUM(TotalAmount) AS TotalSalesAmount FROM fitness_db.Sales WHERE SaleDate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1' YEAR GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SaleDate), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate) ORDER BY SaleYear, SaleMonth;

arguments.sql: SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SaleDate) AS SaleYear, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate) AS SaleMonth, SUM(TotalAmount) AS TotalSalesAmount FROM fitness_db.Sales WHERE SaleDate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1' YEAR GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SaleDate), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate) ORDER BY SaleYear, SaleMonth;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
